title: The Radiant Morn Hath Passed Away
lyrics:
The radiant morn
Hath pass'd away,
And spent too soon
Her golden store;
The shadows of departing day
Creep on once more.

Our life is but a fading dawn
Its glorious noon
How quickly past;
Lead us, O Christ,
When all is gone,
Safe home at last.

O by Thy soul inspiring grace
Uplift our hearts
To realms on high;
Help us to look
To that bright place
Beyond the sky.

Where light, and life,
And joy, and peace
In undivided empire reign,
And thronging Angels never cease
Their deathless strain;

Where Saints are clothed
In spotless white,
And evening shadows never fall,
Where Thou, Eternal Light of Light,
Art Lord of all.
